Reduce heat so liquid is at a simmer and add hibiscus flowers. Simmer until liquid is a very deep reddish-purple, about 5 minutes. Remove from heat and cover. Let sit 20 minutes to infuse.Step 2Strain shrub through a fine-mesh sieve into a heatproof container. Cover and chill until cold, at least 1 hour.Step 3Do Ahead: Shrub can be made 2 weeks ahead. Keep chilled.AssemblyStep 4For each drink, combine 2 oz. vermouth and 1½ oz. shrub in a tall glass. Fill with ice and stir for several seconds. Carefully pour in 1 oz. coconut milk as close to surface of drink as possible to keep it from sinking; you want it to float on top.
